title: Do you feel that Facebook hasn't been completely truthful with the public? - Quora

response.answer_text: My question would be, what would make ANYONE think that a SOCIAL media site that caters to folks wanting to show off pics of their pets, or their love life, or their houses, or their clothes or WHATEVER they have or do in their lives, should be truthful at all? WHY. It is a SOCIAL site, for SOCIAL contact, not rocket science!
